Package ch.hearc.compute

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boundaries
    Contains the areas on which to compute the colors, top-left and bottom-right corners as delimiters
    Works similarly to producer-consumer pattern
    Use setNext to insert an area (producer), and getNext to access the next area (consumer)
    Works in the First-in First-out behaviour.
    Computation_Ambilight
    Manages the ambilight mode.
    Computation_fixedColor
    computation used to set a fixed color to the ledstrip. needs to send color at least once every 2 seconds so the ledstrip don't turn off
    Computation_I
    Abstract class that defines the Computation.
    Computation_perso
    computation used to set a personalized mode to the ledstrip. needs to send something at least once every 2 seconds so the ledstrip don't turn off can latter be used to send animated personalized mode to ledstrip
    WorkerThread
    Calculates the average color of areas around the screen and sends them to the desired output.
